description:
Based off of a drama CD and PSPS game, the Diabolik Lovers series centers around the six sadistic Sakamaki vampire brothers, and the positive and kind-hearted heroine, Yui Komori. Due to her father`s work, she has to transfer to a new school, and ends up living with the Sakamaki brothers.
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Yui Komori is living with the 6 vampires, the Sakamaki brothers, who continue to take her blood daily. But one day, the limousine Yui and the Sakamaki brothers are in crashes.
4 new vampires, the Mukami brothers, emerge. They call Yui "Eve," but what is their motive...?
Source: crunchyroll

Yui Komori wakes up to realize she`s in Mukami`s mansion.
She was taken by the brothers and is told she is to live there with them.
The Mukami brothers need Yui for their "plan" and call her "Eve."
Source: crunchyroll

After getting her blood sucked by Ruki Mukami, Yui Komori wakes up in her own room the next day. She enters the living room where the 4 Mukami brothers are enjoying dinner together. They leave for school telling Yui to stay with Azusa.
Source: crunchyroll

Yuma Mukami appears in the bathroom during Yui Komori`s bath and pulls her out.
Yuma takes Yui to a well-kept garden where he grows vegetables.
Yui asks his purpose for growing them if vampires don`t need to eat food like humans.
Yuma begins to talk about his and the Mukami brothers` past, but in the middle of the conversation, he suddenly feeds on Yui`s blood...
Source: crunchyroll

Kou Mukami visits Yui Komori in her room and gives her roses as a gift.
Yui expresses her appreciation for the beautiful roses, but is confused when Kou demands something in return and suddenly changes his behavior. Kou feeds on her blood and Yui blacks out. When she comes to, Kou is gone. The same night, Kou returns from work and asks Yui to help him get changed. Yui goes to his room and discovers multiple scars on Kou`s back...
Source: crunchyroll

Ruki Mukami suddenly allows Yui Komori to attend school. Perplexed, Yui changes in her school uniform and heads to school with the 4 Mukami brothers. After parting with the brothers, she reunites with Kanato, Laito, and Reiji Sakamaki, but they disappear without a proper conversation. Walking alone, Yui is grabbed by Subaru and is dragged to the rooftop. Kou appears there as well and Subaru forcibly sucks Yui`s blood in front of him...
Source: crunchyroll

Ruki Mukami starts feeling impatient when Kou and Azusa both confirm they don’t have any signs of the awakening. That night, Yui Komori trips on the school stairs due to lack of blood, but is saved by Yuma.  On their way to the nurse’s office, they run into Shu Sakamaki. Irritated by Shu’s attitude, Yuma suddenly feeds on Yui in front of Shu...
Source: crunchyroll

As usual, Yui Komori is having dinner with all the Mukami brothers except for Ruki.
Ruki has been secluded in his room lately and his brothers have noticed his change in behavior.
While Yui is preparing for school one night, Ruki suddenly appears and takes her to the basement room.
There, Ruki feeds on her blood and Yui blacks out...
The Mukami brothers are taken aback when Ruki tells them to take more of Yui`s blood to become Adam.
Thereafter, Yui is locked in the room and the brothers feed on her every day.
In her weakened state, she hears a familiar voice.
Surprised, she turns to the voice to see the figure of Ayato Sakamaki.
Source: crunchyroll

Yui Komori wakes up in her room in the Sakamaki mansion where Laito Sakamaki forcibly feeds on her blood.
Laito comments that Yui has changed and tries to take more blood, but Reiji interferes and tells Yui to come to the living room.
In the living room, Reiji asks about the Mukami brothers and Yui tells him all she knows.
When she`s done, Reiji  appears as though he has figured everything out.
Once the 6 Sakamaki brothers have gathered, Reiji explains that on the next full moon,-- a lunar eclipse which will occur in the human world and demon world simultaneously— vampires will lose significant amount of power. 
Ayato feels there’s nothing to be concerned, but Shu warns them not to take the situation lightly.
Feeling Reiji knows something about Eve, Yui goes to his room to question him.
Reiji tells her she doesn’t need to know and feeds on her blood...
Source: crunchyroll

Yui Komori resists while Shu Sakamaki takes her blood and this makes Shu crave it even more. In the Mukami mansion, Kou, Yuma, and Azusa Mukami are perplexed about Ruki allowing Ayato to take Yui.
As they try to question Ruki on his intentions, a pack of wolves invade their mansion.
Meanwhile, Yui stares out the window in the Sakamaki mansion when Kanato appears.
He takes Yui`s blood by force when suddenly, an injured Azusa appears.
Kanato is enranged as Azusa tries to take Yui with him...
Source: crunchyroll

Yui Komori returns to Mukami’s mansion along with Azusa.
There, she finds a badly injured Ruki lying on the bed.
He’s been injured to save Azusa.
Kou, Yuma, and Azusa explain to Yui the reason Ruki has been acting strange lately. 
One of the Mukami brothers are to become “Adam” by drinking Yui’s blood, but Ruki got frustrated when there was no sign of the awakening.
Yui stays to look after Ruki when he comes to. When asked why she’s there, Yui tell him she was brought there by Azusa.
Yui suggests telling the others his troubles, to which Ruki responds angrily but begins revealing his torment...
Source: crunchyroll

After the Mukami brothers were attacked by wolves, the Sakamaki brothers are attacked as well.
They fight off the wolves despite their injuries. 
The Sakamaki brothers reach a conlusion that the Founders are behind the attacks and they`re after Yui Komori.
To protect Yui, Ayato heads to the Mukami mansion once again.
Ayato informs Yui and Ruki about the attacks by the Founders and that their true objective is Yui.
Not wanting to cause any more trouble, Yui wants to separate herself from the others, but Ayato and Ruki objects.
Ruki suggests a truce between Sakamaki`s and Mukami`s in order to protect Yui from the Founders.
Ayato reluctantly agrees but emphasizes that Yui belongs to him and drinks her blood...
Source: crunchyroll
